text.textblock: In accordance with section 10(a)(2) of the Federal Advisory Committee Act (P.L. 92-463), announcement is made of the following Committee Meeting:

The Army Science Board's Issue Group on Analysis, Test and Evaluation will meet to conduct a review of the operation of the ``Battle Labs'' and how it relates to operational testing. This meeting will be open to the public. Any interested person may attend, appear before, or file statements with the committee at the time and in the manner permitted by the committee. The ASB Administrative Officer, Sally Warner, may be contacted for further information at (703) 695-0781.
